author: jensseidel
msg: * subversion/po/de.po: German translation update. There are still 164
fuzzy and 86 untranslated messages (previously 261 fuzzy and
173 untranslated). The number of translated messages (1645) is too high,
not every message is used. This results from merging the previous PO file
with itself to adapt line breaks, so that this file has a readable diff
against the previous revision. Will file a bug against gettext soon.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r31081, r31082, r31153, r31155 from trunk:
Various improvements to svnmerge-migrate-history.py for dealing
with the kinds of problems caused by svnmerge.py's total ignorance

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a bug which caused filenames with a single character before the
(test_splitext): Update test to cover the bug fixed here.
